task.summary:
Fix for LC101 students using Unix based systems
uses SQLite as an alternative

Working persistence for Categories [Index and Add]
CategoryController - Index returns a list view of the categories in the db - Add [get] for posting a new category - Add [post] for storing the category in the db
CheeseCategory - simple Category class with an ID (primary key) and Name properties
AddCheeseCategoryViewModel - for use in the Add route and data validation
Index.cshtml - simple list of categories from db
Add.cshtml - simple form accepting and validating a Name parameter
CheeseDbContext - added a DbSet for the CheeseCategory
tested and working so far

Completed single model data persistence
Cleaned up and added some links to the navbar and Categories page
Completed the OneToMany (CheeseMVC persistent part two) studio

tested and working so far
